Modul wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung
Package wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.controller

Klasse Controller_bankAccount

java.lang.Object
wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.controller.Controller_bankAccount
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
ProfileAware
public class Controller_bankAccount extends Object implements ProfileAware
Controller_bankAccount manages bank account information. It displays bank accounts in a TableView and allows adding, editing, and deleting bank accounts through dialogs. It implements the ProfileAware interface to receive and update the user profile.

  • Methodendetails

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller after the FXML root element is loaded. Sets up the bank account table and initializes the dialog button helper.

    • setupBankAccountTable

      private void setupBankAccountTable()
      Sets up the bank account table by configuring columns, applying styles, and registering change listeners.

    • createActionCellFactory

      private javafx.util.Callback<javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<BankAccount,Void>,javafx.scene.control.TableCell<BankAccount,Void>> createActionCellFactory()
      Creates and returns a cell factory for the action column. Each non-empty cell contains two buttons (Edit and Delete).
      Gibt zurück:
      Callback for creating TableCell objects.

    • updateTable

      private void updateTable()
      Aggregates the bank accounts from the profile and refreshes the table.

    • showDeleteConfirmation

      private void showDeleteConfirmation(BankAccount bankAccount)
      Displays a confirmation dialog to delete the specified bank account.
      Parameter:
      bankAccount - the bank account to be deleted.

    • showEditDialog

      private void showEditDialog(BankAccount bankAccount)
      Displays an edit dialog for the specified bank account. Allows editing of the bank account name, balance, and last interaction date.
      Parameter:
      bankAccount - the bank account to be edited.

    • showAddBankAccountForm

      private void showAddBankAccountForm()
      Displays a form dialog to add a new bank account. The form collects the bank account name, balance, and last interaction date.

    • configureDatePicker

      private void configureDatePicker(javafx.scene.control.DatePicker datePicker)
      Configures a DatePicker by applying the appropriate CSS class and ensuring that clicking on the editor opens the calendar.
      Parameter:
      datePicker - the DatePicker to be configured.

    • formatDate

      private String formatDate(Date date)
      Formats a Date into a String using the specified date format.
      Parameter:
      date - the date to be formatted.
      Gibt zurück:
      a formatted date string, or an empty string if the date is null.

    • setProfile

      public void setProfile(Profile profile)
      Sets the profile for this controller and updates the bank account table.
      Angegeben von:
      setProfile in Schnittstelle ProfileAware
      Parameter:
      profile - the profile to be set.
